thread.title: Kangana Ranaut, Lara Dutta and other celebs at an event

author: The Centerstage Team
title: Kangana Ranaut, Lara Dutta and other celebs at an event
text:
Kangana Ranaut, Lara Dutta, Vikas Bahl and designer duo Shantanu-Nikhil were roped in to judge the last episode of a telly series on beauty and fashion.
Kangana Ranaut 

Lara Dutta 
We loved what Kangana wore for the finale.

Zoya Afroz   


Pooja Chopra 
Though Laraâ€™s outfit was bold, she looked uncomfortable in it.

Irrfan 

Gurmeet Choudhary 
A host of celebs walked the red carpet.

Cyrus Sahukar 

Vikas Bahl 
Irrfan looked suave and dapper in a black suit while Gurmeet looked like an English royal guard.
